verbs.description: While Donald Trump [V: will] be the 45th president , he will be only the 44th person — the 44th male — to actually hold the job .
While [ARG1: Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: be] [ARG2: the 45th president] , he will be only the 44th person — the 44th male — to actually hold the job .
[ARGM-ADV: While Donald Trump will be the 45th president] , [ARG1: he] [V: will] be [ARG2: only the 44th person — the 44th male — to actually hold the job] .
[ARGM-ADV: While Donald Trump will be the 45th president] , [ARG1: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: be] [ARG2: only the 44th person — the 44th male — to actually hold the job] .
While Donald Trump will be the 45th president , he will be [ARG0: only the 44th person — the 44th male] — to [ARGM-ADV: actually] [V: hold] [ARG1: the job] .
